SEARCH

Class FileSystem.Main

java.lang.Object
FileSystem.Main
public class FileSystem.Main extends Object
FileSystem.Main class to manage the file system. The user can perform the following operations: 1. Change directory 2. List directory contents 3. Create file 4. Create directory 5. Delete file 6. Delete directory 7. Move file/directory 8. Search file/directory 9. Print directory tree 10. Sort contents by date 11. Exit
